name: Whimsicott
flavorText:
Like the wind, it can slip through any
gap, no matter how small. It leaves
balls of white fluff behind.

previous.name: Cottonee
previous.flavorText:
When attacked, it escapes by shooting
cotton from its body. The cotton serves
as a decoy to distract the attacker.

next.name: Petilil
next.flavorText:
The leaves on its head are very bitter.
Eating one of these leaves is known
to refresh a tired body.

as a decoy to distract the attacker.
